quoteText: you may have the rights of information, access (including where applicable portability), rectification, erasure, restriction of and objection to further processing, as well as the rights to withdraw your consent (where consent is the basis of processing) and express other preferences, not to be subjected to automated decision making, and to file privacy complaints with us or with competent authorities.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
